casebody.data:
Marc P. HALL, petitioner,
v.
Jeff THOMAS, Warden. No. 15-8221. Supreme Court of the United States April 18, 2016.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and the petition for a writ of certiorari dismissed. See Rule 39.8.

Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
